verses.text: Buried beneath the yielding wave, The great Redeemer lies; Faith views him in the watery grave, And thence beholds him rise.
Thus do those willing souls, to-day, Their ardent zeal express, And in the Lord's appointed way, Fulfill all righteousness.
With joy we in his footsteps tread, And would his cause maintain,â€” Like him be numbered with the dead, And with him rise and reign.
His presence oft revives our hearts, And drives our fears away; When he commands, and strength imparts, We cheerfully obey.
